Information entered here is optional and will only be used so the others can see your basic details. If you want, you can skip this part for now or enter only some details and then later through your profile icon you can enter the rest.
You can choose to change profile picture from one of yours from the gallery or you can choose from some default avatars we have prepared. If you do not choose any, random one will be given to you.
Register a new account, log into existing one or skip this step for now.
I want to keep this private for now.
Password needs to have at least 8 characters.
Password confirmation should match the password!
User with same email already exists!
User with same username already exists!
Registration successful. Log into your account to continue.
Age needs to be in range of 12 to 99 years

Panic calendar is a tool which helps you track your panic attacks. Each time you have one you should add it and then you will have exact time and date the attack occurred with the description of it and it\'s strength for later reference.
Title and description should closely match your attack and it\'s characteristics. Attack strength should approximately match your panic attack strength.
You don\'t have any records yet. Do you want to add one?
Are you sure you want to delete this record?
Are you sure you want to delete all records from database? NOTE: This can\'t be undone!
Panic attack record can\'t be deleted
Panic attack record can\'t be updated
Panic attack records couldn\'t be deleted
There is no panic attack records to delete

Pill diary is a tool which helps you track your pill intake schedule. Remembering exact time when pill was drank is very important but sometimes very hard to remember. This tool helps you to know exact time you took one.
Date of creating record is added automatically when you create a new record. Extra notes are used if you need any more information about your medication use at a later date.
Pill diary records couldn\'t be deleted
There is no pill diary records to delete
Pill diary record can\'t be deleted
Pill diary record can\'t be updated
This is the place where you can see all your profile information and manage it.
Room password needs to have at least 6 characters.
There was error joining the chat room.

Fight club is a place where you can create or join a chat group. Groups are places where you can talk or express your feelings with people of similar thoughts. To join a group simply find one and click to join or if it\'s a closed one you will need password also. To create one choose it\'s name, description and possibility to be open or closed one.
To use functionality of Fight club chat groups you need to have a registered account and be logged in.
You are the last person in room. If you leave the room will be deleted. Do you wish to leave or stay?
If you leave the room you will lose all the data from this chat including images that are stored on your device. Do you wish to see this warning in the future?
There is no chat rooms active at the moment. Be the first to make one.
Leave and don\'t show this warning again
Leave but show me this warning again
Room with same name already exists.
Room in which you were before you gone away was deleted because there was no active users in it.

"Pill diary is a tool for persons that between all need to drink medicine for their diagnose. It helps you to manage your pill intake with correct name of the pill, date and time. It removes the need to memorize the time you took the pill if you took her at all and makes it easier to categorize it and search later.\nPanic calendar is a tool for persons that suffer from panic disorder or general panic attacks. Main problem with panic attacks and panic disorder in general is that we forget the symptoms and the feel we had when we experience the seizure but which is critical in fighting them when another attack comes. With panic calendar it is easy to give each attack strength, description and date and time it happened for further reference.\nFight club is a place where you can join many chat groups with people that have similar problems or create your own. There you can ask for advice, give advice to somebody else or connect with somebody on other platforms to more privately discuss your issues. "

This application is a project of a single person. Suffering for a few years from the problem that this application was made upon I tried to make something that would help people get with their diagnose easier or if they didn\'t have any not to fight their demons alone. It is estimated that every third person in the world suffers from some kind of anxiety and that is a huge number. Anxiety is a huge category that many smaller diagnoses fall into and that\'s why not every person can be subjected to the same treatment. Feeling most of this myself I know that sometimes conversation is the best cure and that\'s why I believe group chats are the strongest feature of this application. While that is sometimes enough sometimes you need additional help and several other in-app tools help to organize your daily struggle. Take note though that this isn\'t to be confused with real medical advice and is only here to help you fight or if you have tried everything else and you just want advice from other people.
If you have some thoughts you would like to share with me, propose a new feature, tell me about a bug or just say hi you can do that in the e-mail address below.

If you would like to support me and this product to run without problems for a long time you can do that on the website below. You can also find information about application and it\'s development state there.
Change theme to dark or normal

There is networking issues detected. Check your network connection or try later again.
